meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the September 16, 2024 Transportation and Infrastructure Committee Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Bike Plan 2025: Status Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the status of the Dallas Bike Plan 2025.

agenda_items.title: Elm Fork Water Treatment Plant Water Quality Improvements Program
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the water quality improvements program by the Construction Manager-at-Risk.

agenda_items.description: Amendments for the implementation and enforcement of a continuing wastewater pretreatment program.

agenda_items.description: Quarterly report from the Department of Transportation & Public Works.

agenda_items.title: Aviation: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1
agenda_items.description: Amend the scope of work for the de-icing facility at the airport.

agenda_items.title: Transportation & Public Works: Authorize a professional engineering services contract
agenda_items.description: Contract for traffic signal design services for five intersections.

agenda_items.description: Payment for operation and maintenance costs for the Dallas Streetcar System.

agenda_items.title: Transportation & Public Works: Authorize a construction services contract
agenda_items.description: Contract for the construction of new traffic signals at Lancaster Road and Wheatland Road.

agenda_items.title: Transportation & Public Works: Authorize an Advance Funding Agreement
agenda_items.description: Agreement for federal funding for a Category 10 project.
